org.concordion.ext.storyboard

Class StoryboardListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.concordion.ext.storyboard.StoryboardListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, org.concordion.api.listener.AssertEqualsListener, org.concordion.api.listener.AssertFalseListener, org.concordion.api.listener.AssertListener, org.concordion.api.listener.AssertTrueListener, org.concordion.api.listener.ConcordionBuildListener, org.concordion.api.listener.SpecificationProcessingListener, org.concordion.api.listener.ThrowableCaughtListener

    public class StoryboardListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.concordion.api.listener.AssertEqualsListener, org.concordion.api.listener.AssertTrueListener, org.concordion.api.listener.AssertFalseListener, org.concordion.api.listener.ConcordionBuildListener, org.concordion.api.listener.SpecificationProcessingListener, org.concordion.api.listener.ThrowableCaughtListener
    Listens to Concordion events and/or method calls and then adds the required cards to the story board.
